summary: Adds some subtle details to the barren, lifeless landscape of the city of Whiterun.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/31450-1-1397968738.jpg[/img]


[b][u]A lore-friendly decorative mod which improves the:[/u][/b]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/684492/?]Arthmoor[/url]'s [b][color=#00FF00][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/8058/?]Open Cities Skyrim[/url][/color] City of Whiterun[/b]![/center]


This mod is, lets say, a small tribute to Arthmoor for his hard efforts to provide us with some of the greatest mods for TES V Skyrim!
Don't forget to [color=#e2a753]endorse[/color] it, if you liked it! Help the others gamers be aware of this little mod! :)



[u][heading]MOD INFO[/heading][/u]
Whiterun is a city located at the center of the grass-rich steppes of Skyrim. However, most of city's open areas, completely lack any grass. This comes in contradiction with the ambudance of grass seen immediately outside the city's walls, and or, other cities of Skyrim. My mod comes to correct this.



[u][heading]MOD DETAILS[/heading][/u]
The mod does nothing more than just some subtle additions of hand-placed grass to the city of Whiterun, which greatly improves the city's immersion, without any noticeable hits to the performance (FPS). The mod is 100% compatibility with all the Open Cities Skyrim-compatible mods out there!

[u]What my mod does:[/u][list][*] Makes the city of Whiterun have some more grass, like all the other hold capital cities of Skyrim. A lore-friendly mod that does not alter the natural tundra landscape of Whiterun.[*] Whiterun's landscape is now more lively and no longer barren.[*] The shrubs and grass are placed carefully, without breaking any immersion.[*] Is a clean mod. Always scanned with TES5Edit and checked for errors.[*] Is a friendly mod. Fully compatible with all other mods in your game![*] Is Loading Order-neutral mod. Doesn't matter where in the Loading Order you place it! Just make sure the Open Cities Skyrim, by Arthmoor, are installed too![/list]
[u]What my mod does NOT: [/u][list][*] No edits to Navmesh.[*] No edits to textures, meshes or lights.[*] No edits to any NPCs, Dragons, etc.[*] No edits to existing Buildings, Decor, Objects, Items, or Walls.[*] No edits to Landscape, Trees, Rocks, and Flora.[*] No edits to the vanilla game, at all. Absolutely no edits![*] No disabled nor deleted stuff! (my mod does not touch the game at all)[*] No dirty edits, ITM, and such trash! The mod is absolutely clean! (verified by TES5Edit)[*] No edits to scripts, events and quests, or whatever you may think. and... [*]...contains no errors![/list]

[u][u]

[heading]MOD REQUIREMENTS[/heading][/u][/u]
This mod requires the [b][color=#00FF00][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/8058/?]Open Cities Skyrim[/url][/color][/b] by Arthmoor to be installed. Although it can be used without the OCS, you won't see any improvements in the vanilla's games city of Whiterun.



[u][u][heading]INSTALL[/heading][/u][/u]
Just place the .esp to the Skyrim/Data Folder and activate it.




[u][u][heading]UNINSTALL[/heading][/u][/u]
Just deactivate/remove the .esp from the Skyrim/Data Folder.




[u][heading]LOAD ORDER[/heading][/u]
This is a Load Order Neutral Mod. With simple words, really it doesn't matter where you place it. This mod is safe to be placed anywhere in your game's mod loading order. Even loading it before the Open Cities Skyrim is absolutely safe, as it is the case of LOOT. Feel free to group it in the same load order with all other decoration mods for your game.



[u][heading]COMPATIBILITY[/heading][/u]
My mod is designed with the goal of full compatibility with anything else that decorates the same cells in Open Cities Whiterun, and therefore it decorates the city carefully, without touching any pre-existed objects!
[u]The Open Cities Skyrim - Better Whiterun is:[/u]
[color=#00cc00]100%[/color] compatible with any game versions
[color=#00cc00]100%[/color] compatible with all Official Patches
[color=#00cc00]100%[/color] compatible with all Unofficial Patches
[color=#00cc00]100%[/color] compatible with all the Official DLCs (Dawnguard, etc)
[color=#00cc00]100%[/color] compatible with any mods that may do changes to Open Cities Skyrim
[color=#00cc00]100%[/color] compatible with any mods that add stuff to Open Cities Skyrim
[color=#00cc00]100%[/color] compatible with any overhaul mods
[color=#00cc00]100%[/color] compatible with any texture mods
[color=#00cc00]100%[/color] compatible with any NPC mods
With simple words, my mod is [color=#00cc00]100%[/color] compatible with anything in TES V Skyrim! Need to say more?


[u][heading]HISTORY/CHANGELOG[/heading][/u]
[b]Version 1.0 - Date: 08/08/2014[/b][list][*]Added.[/list]



[u][heading]TROUBLESHOOTING[/heading][/u]
Please do not post here any problems you may have in your game! My mod DOES
NOT TOUCHES ANYTHING in your game! Absolutely nothing! :)
So if your game crashes to desktop, your savefiles are bloated or corrupted, or if
Â you have missing items/objects in the towns, floating torches, or
invisible walls, or whatever, it is very likely that you messed it up.
That's why the community always warns: be careful when installing mods!
Always read their readmes for proper installation/uninstall! Please do
not ask for my help, unless you got a proof that a problem in your game
is caused by the Open Cities Skyrim - Better Whiterun mod. To ensure this, first
test carefully all the installed mods in your game, one by one, Disable
all mods that may do changes to outdoors/landscape/cities, before you
accuse my mod for any troubles you may be having with other mods! :)




Have a nice day and [color=#e2a753]remember to [b]endorse[/b] the mod[/color]!
author: SilentResident
